specifications.Dye Method: PFD / BO The fabric which is prepared for dyeing or print. Yarn Effect > High Twist Yarn High twist yarn is made by tightly twisting staple fibers or filament yarns, resulting in a higher number of twists per unit length. It adds texture, a crisp feeling, and a cool touch to the fabric.
specifications.Care Advice: Woven > Satin Weave > Crepe Satin This fabric is easily damaged by rubbing or scratching, so please handle it with care. Regenerated > Acetate This fabric is easy to damage, so be careful when handling it and keep it dry. It may shrink or become misshapen if it gets wet. Store it in a cool, dry place where it can get plenty of air.
specifications.Care Instructions: Dry clean only Recommended Use Bridal, Dresses, Blouses, Partywear, Abaya
